rules_text: [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
special_text:
I – Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put a creature card with mana value 4 or less from among them onto the battlefield and the rest into your graveyard.
II – Any number of target creatures you control fight target creature you don't control.
III – Put up to three target cards from your graveyard on top of your library in any order.
